value:
$nMPID_双界リーフ|Lord Seliph's garb is connected
to the crusader Baldr while mine
is based on the crusader Njörun.

$nMPID_セリス|During desperate times, people hope
for a savior...$k$pThis festival in honor of the crusaders
must have been started by people
who knew the sting of that hope.

$nMPID_双界リーフ|A tournament is being held for the
festival and, though it's all in sport,
everyone is taking it seriously.$k$pMyself included, of course.

$nMPID_セリス|I felt awkward wearing the outfit of
Baldr like a costume—but I've grown
more comfortable as I've worn it.

$nMPID_双界リーフ|Lord Seliph and I were just about
to begin our training session. Would
you like to join us?

$nMPID_双界リーフ|We are in the midst of a festival at
$Nf's castle!

$nMPID_双界リーフ|Fitting for descendants of the
legendary 12 crusaders!

$nMPID_双界リーフ|I bear the responsibility! But with
Lord Seliph at my side, I will not
allow my shame to win the day!

$nMPID_セリス|This is no cause for concern. We all
have hardships we must overcome.

$nMPID_双界リーフ|It's unfortunate we're not able to
spend every day at a festival like
this one...$k$pN-not that I've lost sight of what
matters! ...Do you know what
I mean, Lord Seliph?

I am Leif of Leonster. I have come to
participate in the Day of the Twelve
celebrations, joined by Lord Seliph.

$nMPID_双界リーフ|Members of the liberation army
gathered at the Tower of Dahna and
made blood contracts with the gods...$k$pAnd so they were able to defeat
the forces of Loptous...$k$p$nMPID_セリス|Together, they founded Grannvale
itself and its six duchies, along with
the five kingdoms.$k$pBut in time...the servants of light
and dark came to fight once more.$k$p$nMPID_双界リーフ|We gained allies, grieved those we
lost, learned of bravery and the
importance of building peace.$k$p$nMPID_セリス|If those descended from crusaders
were to indulge in the power granted
to them by their Brand...$k$pI believe they would be no better
than Deadlords.$k$p$nMPID_双界リーフ|A crusader's power is to be wielded
to aid the powerless. We must not
forget that.$k$pWe must not allow our descendants
to forget either.$k$p$nMPID_セリス|Indeed. A battle between dragons,
white and black... A battle that will
last into ages unknown.$k$pBut we do know that we have
inherited the light of the crusaders,
and that is enough direction.$k$p$nMPID_双界リーフ|We must continue to follow that
light. We cannot lose sight of it
as our world enters a new age!
せいっ
Hit!
わああっ
Too careless...!
So strong...
$nMPID_二人|Crusader's might!
$nMPID_二人|Strike... Now!
$nMPID_双界リーフ|In Njörun's name!
$nMPID_セリス|In Baldr's name!
Can't...go on...
Fear not—I'm with you.
Hold fast.
"A blessing..." "Upon you all!"
"Let's show them..." "The light!"
Yes!
"You certainly look smart!" "As do you, Prince."
I'll consider it.
Leave this to us.
Let's move.
$nMPID_双界リーフ|A bow, huh...
$nMPID_セリス|Is something the matter, Prince Leif?

$nMPID_双界リーフ|Ah, Lord Seliph... Well, I was
given a bow to use for the
festival tournament.

But because this festival is in honor
of the 12 crusaders, I was hoping to
wield a lance.

$nMPID_セリス|To emulate your ancestor Njörun,
I presume.

$nMPID_双界リーフ|Exactly. Altena has a much...stronger
connection to her, though.

When I see my older sister astride
a wyvern, wielding the Gáe Bolg...$k$pI cannot help but think she is like
Njörun reborn.

I'm envious of that, I have to admit.
I wish I could carry a divine weapon
into battle.

$nMPID_セリス|This envy serves no purpose,
Prince Leif. There will always
be something one cannot do.

The crusaders' blood is in my veins
as well, and yet I cannot use magic
the way Julia does.
$nMPID_双界リーフ|That's true...

$nMPID_セリス|Even without a divine weapon,
your contribution has been great.
All are thankful, myself included.

And with the battles you've endured...$k$pthere can be no doubt your
achievements are worthy of
the crusaders of yore.

$nMPID_双界リーフ|It means a lot to hear you
say that.

You're right. I should focus on
making the most of what I do have,
rather than dwelling on what I don't.

$nMPID_セリス|Precisely. Now, I'll be looking
forward to seeing what you can
do with that bow in the tournament.
$nMPID_双界リーフ|I won't let you down, Lord Seliph.
